reviewText: Not able to get to see the show in person, this is a quality dvd showing the complete show. Wonderful, thanks

A bit too confusing, a bit too much. Less is more. Some of the music was fine but most was just passable. Most performances were great some other dilettantish. All in all I'm not sorry I bought it but I don't believe I'll be watching reputedly as I do with most of my musicals.
We have enjoyed the live performance. Now we can see it again on DVD. Our grandchildren watched it already and were very positive.
This has been watched by the whole family numerous times and is holding the interest of my Grandchildren from the ages of Eight and up.  We, in our 70's love it also.

Noah is the musical at Branson, MO. that i had not seen.  I saw "Joseph" and it was spectacular.  Since Noah is now playing in PA. I can't make that trip.  I have both DVDs and share them with church friends.  they are amazed at how spectacular they both are.  the ones who do not want to see the DVDs are the ones who are waiting to see the shows live.  If you can't get to Branson, or PA. order the DVDs and share them with your friends.
not as good as Jonah
Everything as expected
Excellent! Wonderful presenttation of the gospel but don't leave until the credits role they save the best for last!
Great
LOVED IT
THE BEST OF THE BEST
Saw it for the first time tonight. So much fun and surprisingly relatable! It's a long show but definitely worth the watch. My whole family enjoyed it. Makes me want to see it live!
I was pleased
I cannot believe someone had the common sense to put this on DVD. I figured this would never make it. Just an incredible live performance in a theater that is simply amazing as well.
I have been to the Sight and Sound theater to see Noah on Two different occasions and this DVD was as good as being there.
Enjoying it!
The quality of acting and music is amazing. They stayed very true to the Bible.

Another amazing musical! Bought this as a gift for my mother, and she loved it. We were lucky to see Jonah in person, and have purchased that and other musicals from these talented people. I definitely recommend you buy one yourself, or go see a show in person. It is an amazing experience!
Great work in bringing the bible to life!
Very well done.
just as described- fast shipping and packaged well. A++++
Best movie on Noah and the flood.  It is very captivating and follows the Bible narrative.
Wonderful DVD Movie for everyone to watch and be redeemed!

Whenever I read, hear, or even watch a Bible, sometimes I wonder how many forms it can take. The latest movie version of this story, for example, had trees living, and talking, and had the man, Noah himself, threaten to kill off any child that would be born on the ark. They even had a stowaway for crying out loud.

I don't know if it's fortunate or unfortunate that there are no talking trees in this filmed live showing of this Stage Musical, but fortunately, the idea of Noah killing newborns off, and them having a stowaway, are absent from this version of the Noah story. As far as I am concerned..., both of those moments are just too dark, and out of character for Noah.

I like how original the songs are in this. The Musical, being about 2 hours long, explains in good detail how this man and his Family built the ark, survived a flood, and made a promise that, until the end of time, he would never do that again.

Noah was a kind-hearted, and forgiving man, not a murderer. And this Stage Musical proves it.

A nine out of ten, and 4 1/2 stars out of 5 for Noah: The Musical.

...Rock the boat. ;)
If you like live performances than you may enjoy this.
